alternate_name: LA LIGA CONTRA EL SIDA, LA LIGA
description:
The League Against AIDS, Inc. is a non-profit AIDS service corporation. Our company is dedicated to providing a continuum of educational, supportive and case management services.

Services include:

* Case management
* Chore services
* Day health care
* Patient education and support
* Environmental accessibility adaptations
* Home delivered meals
* Homemaker services
* Personal care services
* Skilled nursing
* Specialized medical equipment 
* Substance abuse treatment
name: LEAGUE AGAINST AIDS, INC.
